creator: tah@gi.alaska.edu
text:
On page http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/handler.html
the SetHandler href should be:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/mod/core.html#sethandler
It currently points incorrectly to mod_mime.html#sethandler.

creator: erik@codefaktor.de
text:
Fixed in CVS.
Thanks for using Apache 2.0!
